A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If this movie had 30 less minutes of Canto Bight I would have given it a five star review. Less of a matinee homage than the original trilogy\, this installment surprised us and gives the franchise room to expand both in storyline and cinematic stylings. A flawed masterpiece that is better on the whole than Return of the Jedi.Wholly enjoyable.
